page.title: 09ABRONHILL HIGH SCHOOL (1)
page.content: Abronhill High School was officially opened on the{22 November 1978} by Councillor Dr Malcolm Green JP. It was the third non-denominational secondary school to open in Cumbernauld New Town. The school is built to educate approximately 1,000 pupils. The school has a theatre which seats 400, a music suite, a technical wing and a kitchen/dining room. The physical education block contains the swimming pool, gymnasium and large games hall. There are also playing fields and tennis courts beside the playground.There is a landscaped courtyard area which is accessible through the art rooms. The school has a wide range of subjects available to pupils and adults in the community as well: English, Maths, Sciences, History, Geography, Languages and Art.
